meanings.sent1: Her entelechy was finally achieved when she won the competition.
meanings.sent2: The artist's entelechy was evident in every stroke of the brush.
meanings.sent3: The cat's entelechy seemed to be catching the elusive red dot.
meanings.sent4: The garden bloomed with the entelechy of spring.
meanings.sent5: The student's entelechy shone brightly as she aced the exam.

meanings.definition: A vital force that directs an organism toward self-fulfillment.
meanings.sent1: The entelechy within the seed drives it to grow into a mighty tree.
meanings.sent2: The mother's love acted as the entelechy guiding her child's development.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's entelechy was the source of his incredible strength.
meanings.sent4: The entelechy of the river carried the salmon upstream to spawn.
meanings.sent5: The entelechy of the sunflower turned it to face the sun throughout the day.

meanings.sent1: The entelechy of the invention revolutionized the industry.
meanings.sent2: Through hard work, she achieved the entelechy of her dreams.
meanings.sent3: The entelechy of the recipe was a delicious surprise to all who tasted it.
meanings.sent4: The entelechy of the plan unfolded perfectly, much to everyone's delight.
meanings.sent5: The entelechy of the seed sprouted into a beautiful flower in the garden.
